waitingForHostToStart: Waiting for host to start the game
enterUsername: Please enter a username to continue
info1: Embark on a journey to explore the world from your screen!
info2: Look for clues in your surroundings to pinpoint your location.
info3: Use the map to make your guess and see how close you are.
info4: Sharpen your geography skills and have fun!
loginWithGoogle2: to earn XP and track your progress
shortDescMeta: A free alternative to Geoguessr with unlimited play and exciting multiplayer modes. Discover new places and test your geography skills.
fullDescMeta: The best free Geoguessr alternative! Enjoy unlimited rounds, multiplayer battles, and community maps. Explore the world, learn geography, and climb the leaderboards in WorldGuessr.
subtitle: You're dropped in a random spot on Earth. Can you guess where you are?
trackYourProgress1: Link with Google to earn XP and track your progress
addFriendDesc: Add a friend to play together
addFriendDescription: Add a friend to play together
friendReqNotAccepting: This user is not accepting friend requests
alreadyFriends: You are already friends with this user
userAlreadyConnected: You logged in from another device
onboarding2: You've been dropped somewhere in the world. Can you figure out where you are?
onboarding3: Place a pin on the map where you think you are. The closer you get, the more points you'll score.
onboarding4: Use the hint for a general idea of your location. Good luck!
onboarding5: Let's add a timer to spice things up.
onboarding10: The more you play, the more you learn!
onboardingTimeEnd: You forgot to guess within the time. Pay attention!
youGotInvite: {{from}} has invited you to a game!
inviteCooldown: You can invite this user in {{t}} seconds
alreadyInYourGame: User is already in your game
pleaseWaitSeconds: Please wait {{seconds}} seconds to perform this action
lastGuesser: You are the last guesser. Timer reduced to {{s}} seconds
streakLost: Daily login streak lost. Come back tomorrow to grow it!
streakGained: You have a {{streak}} day login streak! Keep it up!
streakStarted: You have a 1 day login streak! Log in daily to grow your streak!
watchAnAdToRestore: Watch a short ad to restore your streak.
notEnoughLocationsInMap: Not enough locations in this map. There will be repeats.
yourTooFastForUs: You're too fast for us! Please slow down.
watchingAdsSupport: Ads help us run the game and keep it free for everyone. Thank you for your support!
videoAdThanks: Thanks for helping us keep WorldGuessr free by watching video ads!
enjoyGameplay: Enjoy 30 minutes of uninterrupted gameplay after this ad break
joinDiscordDesc: Join our community and improve your WorldGuessr skills!
maintenanceModeStarted: WorldGuessr is currently in maintenance mode. Some features may be disabled.
maintenanceModeEnded: Maintenance mode has ended. Enjoy a full WorldGuessr experience!
leagueModalDesc: Play duels to gain ELO and climb the leaderboard.
leagueModalDesc2: Stats may be delayed up to 1 hour
unableToJoinDuel: Unable to find duel at this time. Please email support@worldguessr.com
nameChanged: Name changed. It will take up to 24 hours to reflect.
recentChange: You have a recent name change. It can take up to 24 hours for it to fully update.
nameChangeInProgress: Your name change to {{name}} is in progress, it can take up to 24 hours to fully update.
nameChangeCooldown: You can change your name again in {{days}} days
maintenanceText1:
The game will be down for maintenance on {{date}} from {{time}}.
We apologize for the inconvenience.
multiplayerConnectionErrorMessage: This can happen for a variety of reasons. Please check your internet connection, make sure nobody else is using your account and try refreshing the site.
connectingMessage:
Connecting to multiplayer server... (attempt {{currentRetry}}/{{maxRetries}})

startPlayingToSeeHistory: Start playing to see your game history here
gameNoLongerAvailable: This game is no longer available
playGamesToSeeProgression: Play games to see your progression over time
duelWarningText: Heads up: Using Google or any other outside help is against the rules and could get you banned.
